info.name: E-Commerce API Documentation
info.description: Comprehensive API for managing products, orders, payments, users, vendors, and more in an e-commerce platform.

request.description:
Creates a new user account with email verification. The user will receive an email to verify their account.
Passwords must meet security requirements including minimum length, character diversity, and cannot be common passwords.
Authenticates a user and returns an access token. Implements account lockout protection and tracks failed attempts.

request.description: Logs out the authenticated user and revokes their access token.
Changes the authenticated user's password. Requires current password verification and validates new password strength.
Retrieves comprehensive security information for the authenticated user including account lock status, security score, and password expiry details.
Sends a password reset link to the user's email address.
Resets the user's password using a valid reset token from the forgot password email.

query.description: The expiration timestamp for the verification link. Automatically included.
The signature that validates the signed URL. Automatically included.

variable.description: The verification hash that ensures the link is valid and hasn't been tampered with. This is automatically included in the verification link.
The ID of the user whose email is being verified. This is automatically included in the verification link.

request.description:
This endpoint verifies a user's email address using a signed URL that is sent to their email
after registration. The verification link contains the user ID and a hash for security.
Once verified, the user's email_verified_at timestamp is set and they can access protected features.

response.name: Email verified successfully
Email already verified
Invalid or expired verification link
Signature verification failed

request.description:
Sends a new email verification link to the authenticated user's email address.
This is useful when users don't receive the initial verification email or when
the verification link has expired. The user must be authenticated to request a resend.

item.name: Retrieve a paginated list of users with advanced filtering

query.description: optional Array of filter parameters to narrow down results.
optional Filter users by name (partial match supported).
optional Filter users by email address (partial match supported).
optional Search across user names and email addresses.
optional Filter by role ID(s). Single ID or comma-separated multiple IDs.
optional Filter by registration date. Single date or comma-separated date range (YYYY-MM-DD).
optional Filter by last update date. Single date or comma-separated date range (YYYY-MM-DD).
optional Include related data. Options: role,vendors,userAddress.
optional Page number for pagination. Default: 1.
optional Number of users per page (max 100). Default: 15.
optional Sort users. Prefix with '-' for descending. Available: name, email, created_at, updated_at.

request.description:
Get a comprehensive paginated list of all users in the system with advanced filtering capabilities.
This endpoint provides administrators with complete user information including personal details,
addresses, role assignments, vendor associations, and account status. Essential for user management,
administrative oversight, customer service, and system analytics. Supports powerful filtering and
search functionality to help administrators quickly find specific users or user groups.

item.name: Retrieve a specific user's detailed information

variable.description: The ID of the user to retrieve.

request.description:
Get comprehensive information about a specific user including personal details, address,
role assignments, vendor associations, and account status. This endpoint provides administrators
with complete visibility into user accounts for customer service, account management, and
administrative oversight purposes.

request.description:
Modify an existing product's details including variants, tags, media, and search optimization.
This endpoint supports partial updates - only provided fields will be updated. When updating variants,
all existing variants are replaced with the new ones. Search keywords are automatically regenerated
for optimal findability.

item.name: Soft delete a product with search index update

variable.description: The ID of the product to soft delete.

request.description:
Soft delete a product, making it inactive but preserving the data for potential recovery.
Soft deleted products are hidden from public listings but remain in the database for
administrative purposes and order history integrity. Search indexes are updated automatically.

item.name: Permanently delete a product with complete cleanup

variable.description: The ID of the soft deleted product to permanently delete.

request.description:
Permanently remove a product from the database. This action is irreversible and will
also remove all associated variants, media files, tag associations, and search indexes.
The product must be soft deleted first before it can be permanently deleted.

item.name: Restore a soft deleted product with search optimization

variable.description: The ID of the soft deleted product to restore.

request.description:
Restore a previously soft deleted product, making it active again in the system.
Only products that have been soft deleted can be restored. Search indexes are
automatically updated to include the restored product.

fields will be updated, others remain unchanged. Logo uploads are processed securely with validation.
